content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Furnace at position (1, 1)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position (1, 1)) with fuel (coal) and currently processing copper-ore into copper-plate.

### Wooden chests
Consists of the following entities:
- Wooden chest (position (3.5, 1.5)) containing iron-plate (20).
- Wooden chest (position (3.5, 3.5)) containing iron-plate (50).
- Wooden chest (position (3.5, 5.5)) with an empty inventory.

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when crafting items due to insufficient ingredients
- Ensure you have enough copper-plates in your inventory before attempting to craft Automation Science Packs. The recipe requires 8 copper-plates.

### Errors when inserting items into a furnace that is already occupied
- Verify that the furnace does not already contain items before attempting to insert new items. If the furnace is full, you will not be able to insert additional items.

### Errors when attempting to insert items from an empty inventory
- Make sure you have the required items in your inventory before trying to insert them into the furnace or any other entity.

### Errors when the inventory is full
- Regularly check your inventory space and manage items to avoid being unable to insert new items due to full inventory.
